parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the migration source. The description can be up to 256 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the migration source. The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length. The name must start with a letter and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`. It can contain letters, digits, colons (:), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).
